MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD1 Postcode area of Galashiels. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.21PM. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30PM following reports of faulty electrical equipment on St. Andrews Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.07AM on 24th November 2020.
